content: woodland fingerless mitts by katelyn pettit pine needle knits these woodland fingerless mitts are the perfect staple to those chilly days where warmth and style are a must this pattern is designed to have a longer sleeve that can scrunch up if desired to give a relaxed fit and look please note the mitts pictured here are using a self-striping yarn this pattern does not require more than 1 skein of yarn abbreviations yarn 50 grams fingering weight yarn st s - stitch es k - knit needles 2 25mm us 1 double pointed needles p - purl pm - place marker sm - slip marker gauge 15 sts/24 row = 2x2 inches 5x5 cm in blocked rm - remove marker s stockinette ln - left needle rn - right needle this pattern is knitted in the round on double pointed needles rli - right lifted increase - take right leg of st below st on ln place on note instructions for left and right mitt are identical except for ln & k into the front the set up for the thumb gusset lli - left lifted increase - take left leg of st 2 sts below st on rn place on ln & k into the back instructions cast on 56 sts per mitt divide stitches evenly on needles join in round being sure to not twist your sts place marker at the beginning of the round for cuff work 2 5 inches in knit 3 purl 1 ribbing after cuff is done now work in stockinette stitch for 3 5 inches mitt is now 6 inches in total 56 sts thumb gusset set up right mitt- k 30 pm k1 pm knit to end left mitt- k 53 pm k1 pm knit to end knit to marker sm lli knit to 2nd marker rli sm knit to end knit 2 rounds even pattern knit to 1st marker sm rli k to 2nd marker lli sm k to end knit 2 rounds even repeat last 3 rounds until you have 21 sts between markers ending after the 2 even rounds 77sts k to marker rm slip the next 21 sts to stitch holder or scrap yarn and leave them for later cast on 1 st k to end of round 56 sts on needles 21 on stitch holder/scrap yarn knit in stockinette until mitt measures 2 inches from the end of the thumb gusset increases bind off using the icelandic bind off method or whatever bind off you prefer thumb put 21 sts from stitch holder/scrap yarn back on needles and pick up 3 sts in gap 24 sts knit until thumb measures 1 inch from the picked up sts bind off using same method as above weave in ends and block as desired
